content:
Hi from Groningen :smile:
What do you think about organizing an itinerant recurring meeting, say one per trimester, among interested people in NL?
I've been discussing this with @Sander Dahmen. We'll probably make concrete plans when the holiday is over.
Let me know if you want any help
I'm also moving to NL in October and would be interested in joining such meetings!
@Andrés Goens Cool! Where in NL will you be based?
@Johan Commelin yep, looking forward to it! Going to Amsterdam (UvA)
